title: An historical romance of the wars between the mighty giant Gallieno, and the great knight Nasonius, and his associates
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Sergeant. cf. NUC pre-1956.
A satire on the wars between Louis XIV, King of France, and William III, King of Great Britain.
